ygData.subject: Re: Freeport/Queens Faction Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought of a way to get the guild note of a freeport monk, I do not know if it works but it is worth a try.  What you do is create a freeport monk bring him
ygData.messageBody:
I thought of a way to get the guild note of a freeport monk, I do not know if
it works but it is worth a try. What you do is create a freeport monk bring
him to the newbie zone and fight an orc, let the orc kill you. Then when you
go back to your bind point consent your quenos monk, then log on with your
quenos monk and loot the corpse. If it works it should give you the guild
note.
